alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Gibson; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Crockett, southwestern Gibson, northeastern Haywood and northwestern Madison Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alamo, or 12 miles west of Humboldt, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Humboldt, Trenton, Fairview, Alamo, Bells, Three Way, Holly Grove, Adair, Belle Eagle, Maury City, Gadsden, Gibson, Quincy, Gibson Wells, Allens, Huntersville, New Enterprise, Westover and Jones. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west Tennessee.
